original_text: And there was a very sore battle that day; and Abner was beaten, and the men of Israel, before the servants of David.
korean_text: 그 날에 싸움이 심히 맹렬하더니 아브넬과 이스라엘 사람들이 다윗의 신복들 앞에서 패하니라

sentences.original_text: And there was a very sore battle that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에 매우 치열한 전투가 있었고
